Senator John McCain (R-AZ) blasted Donald Trump in a strongly worded statement. McCain, who Trump insulted last year because he was a prisoner of war for nearly 6 years, said Trump denigrated the Khan family and their sacrifice.

Donald Trump is known for changing his mind. He now says that he thinks the minimum wage should be raised to $10 an hour. He previously said that wages were too high already.

South Carolina Sen. Tim Scott, the only African-American Republican in the U.S. Senate, emotionally detailed his own experiences of being unfairly targeted by the police. Scott revealed that in his first year serving as a senator, he had been stopped by police seven times.
